response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been valued at $10,000 by you. Considering its exceptional quality and unique features, I believe it would greatly benefit you. To make this opportunity accessible to you, I propose a price of $9,500. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an excellent value compared to its market worth. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach an agreement that benefits both of us.", "product_price": 9500}
